segments.text: I'm observing the scene and a sense of dread is creeping in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pooling on the floor is a serious slipping hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If anyone, especially the children, were to step in that, they could fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the mess and potential injuries that would result.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that boy on the stool, heâ€™s in an extremely precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could give way at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His entire weight is unevenly distributed as he reaches for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could be very painful, even dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation really makes me clench my jaw.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's obliviousness only adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a train wreck in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these small details are converging into a large potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene here, and fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of what *could* happen is truly unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR
